option.name: keep_minimized_windows
option.long: Don't delete window contents on minimize. This does not work with some applications

option.name: legacy_fullscreen
option.long: Make Wine and legacy applications fullscreen properly.

option.name: firefox_menu_fix
option.long: Fix window type of Firefox and Thunderbird menus.

option.name: ooo_menu_fix
option.long: Fix window type of OpenOffice.org menus.

option.name: notification_daemon_fix
option.long: Fix window type of notification daemon windows.

option.name: java_fix
option.long: Fix window type of various Java windows.

option.name: java_taskbar_fix
option.long: Fix java windows disappearing from taskbar

option.name: qt_fix
option.long: Fix window type of various Qt windows.

option.name: fglrx_xgl_fix
option.short: Fix screen updates in XGL with fglrx.
option.long: Fix for broken GLX_MESA_copy_sub_buffer on XGL in fglrx.

option.name: force_glx_sync
option.short: Force synchronization between X and GLX
option.long: Force synchronization between X and GLX, which may help for window parts not redrawing correctly when using Nvidia drivers, but also may decrease performance.

option.name: no_wait_for_video_sync
option.long: Don't wait for the next video sync time to redraw

option.name: force_swap_buffers
option.short: Force full screen redraws (buffer swap) on repaint
option.long: Forces the entire screen to redraw every repaint. Use with care, this will cause a massive increase in GPU and CPU usage

option.name: sticky_alldesktops
option.long: Make "on all desktops" windows sticky. Sticky windows are visible on all viewports.

option.name: alldesktop_sticky_match
option.long: Windows on all desktops that should be made sticky
